title: For Rent by Owner 3 Bedroom Magoun Sq. Somerville
posting_body: ['For rent by owner 3 Bedroom occupying second and third floors of two family home.', ' Second floor contains bathroom (6 x 8), kitchen (12 x 12), living room (12 x 19) and bedroom currently used as a dining room (12 x 12).', ' Third floor contains 2 bedrooms (11 x13 and 12 x 13).', ' Unit was renovated less than 10 years ago and contains modern appliances and is in great condition.', ' Steam heat from < 20 year old boiler.', ' Electricity included with monthly rent and supplied by solar panels.', ' Washer and gas dryer connections in basement available.', ' Off-street parking for one vehicle available.', ' Located on Nashua street a three minute walk to Magoun Square green line station pending opening this summer.', 'Walking distance to Davis and Porter squares and various bus lines accessible locally.', ' Credit and background checks will be performed on all applicants.', ' Monthly rent is $3200.', ' Security deposit equal to rent and first month rent required.', ' Up to two cats allowed.', ' No smoking (any products) on property allowed.', ' Available September 1st (or mid-to-late August if needed).']
